app_descript:
Brief:

CBP One is a mobile application designed to streamline various processes for individuals and entities involved in entering the United States. Developed by the U.S. Customs and Border Protection, this app caters to travelers, brokers, carriers, and forwarders, simplifying tasks like requesting inspections for perishable cargo and managing I-94 applications.

Core Features:

  • üìå Inspection Appointment Requests: Request and track inspections for perishable cargo directly from mobile devices.
  • üìå Real-time Status Updates: Receive updates on appointment requests to stay informed on the go.
  • üìå Direct Communication: Chat with a CBP Agriculture Specialist for any necessary additional information.
  • üìå I-94 Management: Apply and pay for the I-94 form up to seven days before arriving at a Port of Entry, with access to a digital copy and travel history.
  • üìå Future Enhancements: Planned features intended to benefit a wide range of operators including Small Vessel, Bus, Aircraft, Seaplane Pilots, commercial truck drivers, and Commercial Vessel Operators.

Pros:

  • üëç Ease of Use: Simplifies the entry process into the U.S. for various user groups, enhancing efficiency.
  • üëç Convenience: Apply for essential travel documents and services through the mobile app without needing to physically visit a POE.
  • üëç Accessibility: Access to five years of travel history and a digital copy of the I-94 form.
  • üëç Timely Notifications: Stay updated with real-time notifications regarding cargo inspections and I-94 applications.

Cons:

  • üëé Limited POE Availability: Some features, like perishable cargo inspections, are only available at participating POEs.
  • üëé Device Limitations: May not be supported on all mobile devices, restricting access for some users.
  • üëé Potential Technical Issues: As with any app, users could encounter unexpected glitches or downtime.
  • üëé Learning Curve: New users may require some time to familiarize themselves with the app's functionalities.

Price:

  • üíµ The CBP One app is available for free, although there may be fees associated with certain services, like the I-94 application.
